scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:data-access-api" "npm run dev:data-analysis"
scripts.dev:web: npm run generate-types && npm run dev --workspace=@ffxiv-tools/web
scripts.build: npm run clean:ts-types && npm run generate-types && npm run build:typescript-config && echo 'Finished building libraries.' && concurrently "npm run build:web" "npm run build:data-access-api" "npm run build:data-analysis"
scripts.clean: concurrently "npm run clean:web" "npm run clean:data-access-api" "npm run clean:data-analysis" "npm run clean:ts-config" "npm run clean:ts-types" && rimraf node_modules target && echo 'Finished cleaning.'
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:web" "npm run test:data-access-api" "npm run test:data-analysis"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:once --workspace=@ffxiv-tools/web && cargo test -p ffxiv-tools-data-access-api && cargo test -p ffxiv-tools-data-analysis
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:web" "npm run lint:data-access-api" "npm run lint:data-analysis"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:web" "npm run start:data-access-api" "npm run start:data-analysis"
